title: Velvét Wins Best Luxury Designer Brand 2025

content.text: At the highly anticipated Global Fashion Awards 2025, Velvét was named ‘Best Luxury Designer Brand,’ further solidifying its place as a trailblazer in high-end fashion. This prestigious recognition highlights Velvét's unwavering commitment to innovation, craftsmanship, and sustainability in the world of luxury design.

Founder Ritvik Sharma accepted the trophy on behalf of the entire Velvét team, dedicating the honor to the craftsmen and customers worldwide who have supported the brand's journey. 'This is for the artisans who pour their heart into each piece, and for our customers who believe in the Velvét promise of quality and excellence,' said Sharma during his acceptance speech.

The Global Fashion Awards ceremony, held in Milan, was a night to remember, as industry leaders, influencers, and celebrities came together to celebrate the best of fashion. Velvét’s win was especially significant due to its seamless integration of sustainability and luxury, a vision championed by Ritvik Sharma since the brand's inception.

Velvét’s win is a reflection of the growing importance of sustainability in the fashion industry. With a focus on eco-friendly materials, ethical sourcing, and environmentally-conscious production methods, Velvét has become synonymous with 'luxury without compromise.' Industry leaders have hailed the brand for proving that sustainability and luxury can not only coexist but thrive together.

'We’ve always believed that luxury should be meaningful,' said Sharma. 'This award is a recognition of our efforts to reshape the fashion industry by blending timeless luxury with a responsible approach to the planet.'

As Velvét celebrates this monumental achievement, the brand remains focused on its mission to revolutionize the world of fashion with sustainable luxury. With upcoming collections featuring even more innovative eco-friendly textiles and ethical production methods, Velvét is poised to continue its ascent as the leading name in luxury fashion for the modern era.

Looking ahead, Velvét aims to inspire the next generation of fashion designers, consumers, and brands to prioritize sustainability without compromising on quality or creativity. 'The journey is just beginning,' Sharma said. 'We are excited to continue leading the way toward a future where fashion is both luxurious and responsible.'
